response.summary: I am an innovative electrical engineer who excels in the planning and design of electrical systems. With fluency in Spanish, French, and English, I possess exceptional management and design abilities that span the entire lifecycle of electrical infrastructures. I thrive under deadline pressure, consistently delivering high-quality results, and I prioritize confidentiality and discretion in all aspects of my work. Furthermore, my valuable experience in a public limited crude oil and natural gas exploration company in a developing country adds a unique perspective to my skill set.
response.skills: Renewable Energy, Project Management, Electrical Wiring, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Energías renovables, Revit, Formación en Revit, AutoCAD, Ingeniería eléctrica, Diseño de iluminación, Electricidad, Microsoft Office, Servicio de atención al cliente, Microsoft Excel, Liderazgo, Investigación y desarrollo, Microsoft PowerPoint, Oratoria, Redes sociales, Mercadotecnia

profile_positions.description:
I specialize in designing and implementing electrical projects in the industry, particularly in the field of thermal production in the oil and gas sector. My expertise includes:

•	Conducting simulations of grounding systems to ensure safety and reliability.
•	Providing electrical design solutions for industrial facilities.
•	Designing power generation and transmission systems.
•	Collaborating with team members and customers to identify practical solutions that improve operations.
•	Applying international standards for electrical design and quality, including NFPA, IEEE, IEC, ANSI, NEMA, NEC, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001.
profile_positions.title: Lead Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description: At IDOM, I actively participated in the design and intervention of thermal production projects in the OIL & GAS industry. My responsibilities included developing and designing engineering projects at various levels, conducting extensive research on power generation and distribution networks, performing grounding system simulations, analyzing loads and creating technical diagrams and plans. I also played a key role in preparing contract documents, evaluating offers, estimating costs and timeframes, and providing expertise in selecting electrical equipment. Additionally, I provided advice on energy alternatives and resource reuse to minimize carbon footprint in construction processes. Throughout my work, I maintained a focus on prioritization, organization, and collaboration to achieve project objectives. Furthermore, I adhered to international standards for electrical design and quality, such as NFPA, IEEE, IEC, ANSI, NEMA, NEC, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description: At Seringtec I gathered experience in design and intervention for thermal production projects in the OIL & GAS industry. My expertise included conducting research, preparing cost estimates and reports, designing electrical systems and components, performing grounding system simulations, overseeing installations and operations, developing maintenance standards, investigating electrical failures, providing energy advice, managing contracts, supervising a diverse team of professionals, and contributing to the improvement of operations through collaboration with team members and customers. My specialization also encompasses electrical design for industrial facilities and power generation and transmission systems.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description: I actively participated in the design and intervention of thermal production projects in the OIL & GAS industry. My responsibilities included designing electrical components, systems, and equipment. I conducted extensive research on the feasibility, design, operation, and performance of power generation and distribution networks, as well as machinery and electrical components. Additionally, I contributed to advising on energy alternatives and resource reuse to reduce the carbon footprint in construction processes. I performed prioritized and organized tasks to effectively achieve service objectives and worked collaboratively with team members and customers to find practical solutions for improving operations. I also prepared design reports, specifications, and contract documents while evaluating bids for construction or maintenance projects.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Design Engineer
